briefdescription.para: Contains a template for a matrix with all the basic matrix operations overloaded.

detaileddescription.para:
James Rosindell
31/08/16
1.2
BSD-3 Licence. Created with large usage of href = "http://www.devarticles.com/c/a/Cplusplus/Operator-Overloading-in-C-plus/1"> this website . There are two distinct classes, Row and Matrix. Most operations are low-level, but some higher level functions remain, such as importCsv().
Modified to include additional functionality by Samuel Thompson (Imperial College London).

listitem.para: version 1.1 fixed memory leak in matrix
version 1.11 also changed policy for acessing invalid areas of the matrix to periodic
version 1.12 added Row ifstream and ostream operators, removed debugging code
